short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hi,Download images by hovering over them with a  format selection.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Image Downloader extension allows users to effortlessly download images from any web page. By hovering over an image, a popup appears with options to download the image in the preferred format (e.g., PNG, JPG). Users can also select multiple images for batch downloading. The extension remembers the default image format set by the user, ensuring a consistent and streamlined experience across sessions. Additionally, the extension requires permissions to access and manage downloads, store user preferences, and interact with web pages to detect images..
